SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class GameGuiController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GameGuiController
public class GameGuiController extends Object
This class is the controller for the main game scene.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Board
    boardModel
    This is the static reference to the board model.
    javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    bookshelfGrid
    This is the JavaFX reference to the main bookshelf grid pane.

    bookshelfModel
    This is the static reference to the bookshelf model.

    client
    This is the static reference to the client, in order to use the sendMessage() function.

    List of the coordinates of the items picked by the player.

    playersBookshelf
    It is the hash map used to associate each unique username to a number, in order to display the correct bookshelf.

    This is the static reference to the view.

  • Field Details

    • MAIN_ITEM_SIZE

      public static final double MAIN_ITEM_SIZE
      This is the size of the main items in the bookshelf.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • pickedItems

      public static List<Coordinates> pickedItems
      List of the coordinates of the items picked by the player. It can have a size of 1 or 2. It contains the coordinates of the starting item and the ending item or the coordinates of the only item picked.

    • client

      public static Client client
      This is the static reference to the client, in order to use the sendMessage() function.

    • view

      public static GuiView view
      This is the static reference to the view.

    • boardModel

      public static Board boardModel
      This is the static reference to the board model.

    • bookshelfModel

      public static Bookshelf bookshelfModel
      This is the static reference to the bookshelf model.

    • playersBookshelf

      public HashMap<String,Integer> playersBookshelf
      It is the hash map used to associate each unique username to a number, in order to display the correct bookshelf.

    • bookshelfGrid

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane bookshelfGrid
      This is the JavaFX reference to the main bookshelf grid pane.

    • grid

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid
      It is the JavaFX reference to the main grid pane.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameGuiController

      public GameGuiController()
      Creates a new GameGuiController, setting the static references to the client and the view. The required references are taken from the MyShelfie class and the GuiView class.

  • Method Details

    • getNodeByRowColumnIndex

      public javafx.scene.Node getNodeByRowColumnIndex(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane selectedGrid, int row, int column)
      Returns the Node at the given row and column position. Please note that the row and column index are referred to the Board System, not to the GridPane. Therefore, the cell (0,0) is the bottom left corner of the board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the node (Board-wise).
      column - the column index of the node (Board-wise).
      Returns:
      the Node at the given row and column position.

    • enableItemsWithOneFreeSide

      public void enableItemsWithOneFreeSide()
      This method enables the items that have at least one free side.

    • enableItem

      public void enableItem(int row, int col)
      Enables the item at the given row and column position. It is called when the user clicks on the element.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the node (Model-wise).
      col - the column index of the node (Model-wise).

    • disableItem

      public void disableItem(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, int row, int col)
      Disables the item at the given row and column position.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the node (Model-wise).
      col - the column index of the node (Model-wise).

    • enableAllItems

      public void enableAllItems(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane)
      Enables all the items in the boardGridPane.

    • disableAllItems

      public void disableAllItems()
      Disables all the items in the boardGridPane.

    • selectItem

      public void selectItem(int row, int col)
      This is the method that handles the selection of an item. If it's the first element selected, then it highlights the pickable items, otherwise in case it's the second element selected, it removes the items from the board and adds them to the rearrange area.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the node (Model-wise)
      col - the column index of the node (Model-wise)

    • highlightItem

      public void highlightItem(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, int row, int col, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Highlights the specified item with the given color.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the node (Model-wise).
      col - the column index of the node (Model-wise).
      color - the color to highlight the item with.

    • highlightSelection

      public void highlightSelection(List<Coordinates> pickedItems)
      Highlights the picked items.
      Parameters:
      pickedItems - the list of the starting and ending coordinates of the picked items.

    • removeItemsFromBoard

      public void removeItemsFromBoard(List<Coordinates> pickedItems)
      Removes the chosen items from the board.
      Parameters:
      pickedItems - the list of the items to remove.

    • enableInsert

      public void enableInsert()
      Enables the columns of the bookshelfGrid that have enough space to insert the pickedItems.

    • disableBookshelf

      public void disableBookshelf()
      Disables all items in the bookshelf, to avoid the user to select a column when it's not his turn or not the right moment.

    • enableBookshelf

      public void enableBookshelf()
      Enables all items in the bookshelf, to allow the user to select a column when it's his turn and the right moment.

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard()
      Updates the boardGridPane with the items in the boardModel. It's called when the board is updated by the server.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the boardGridPane, the bookshelfGrid and the labels.

    • showGame

      public void showGame(Message message)
      Called when the complete game is sent from the server. It loads the personal goal card, the common goal cards, the board and the bookshelf. It loads the current points (0 in case of a new game).
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing the complete game.

    • toggleHelp

      public void toggleHelp()
      Toggles the help hints.

    • updateOtherBookshelves

      public void updateOtherBookshelves(Bookshelf bookshelf, String name)
      Updates the opponents' bookshelves.
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the bookshelf to be updated.
      name - the name of the player that owns the bookshelf.

    • showMessage

      public void showMessage(String message)
      Shows a message on the messageLabel.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be shown.

    • deleteCurrentSelection

      public void deleteCurrentSelection()
      Called when the user clicks on the delete button. It makes it possible to delete the current selection and to bring the items back in the board.

    • selectInGrid

      public void selectInGrid(int row, int col)
      Makes it possible to highlight the item in the grid before changing their order.
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the item
      col - the column of the item

    • changeOrderUp

      public void changeOrderUp(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, List<Item> items)
      Changes the order of the first two items in the grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid where the items are.
      items - the list of items.

    • changeOrderDown

      public void changeOrderDown(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, List<Item> items)
      Changes the order of the last two items in the grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid of the items.
      items - the list of the items.

    • enableRearrange

      public void enableRearrange()
      Enables the grid to be rearranged

    • updateBookshelf

      public void updateBookshelf(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, Bookshelf bookshelf, boolean isMainPlayer, double itemSize)
      Updates the bookshelf view, displaying the given bookshelf in the given grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid to be updated.
      bookshelf - the bookshelf to be displayed.
      isMainPlayer - whether the bookshelf is for the main player. (if false, the bookshelf is for the opponent).
      itemSize - the size of the item.

    • rearrange

      public void rearrange(List<Item> items)
      Putts the selected items in the rearrange Area.
      Parameters:
      items - the items to be put in the rearrange Area.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(List<Integer> topOfScoringList, List<Integer> score)
      Updates the scoring view, updating common goals, personal goals, adjacent groups and total points.
      Parameters:
      topOfScoringList - the list of top of scoring.
      score - the list of personal score.

    • updatePlayerPoints

      public void updatePlayerPoints(List<Integer> score)
      Updates the personal points.
      Parameters:
      score - the list of personal score 0: personal goal 1: common goal 2: adjacent groups 3: total points

    • showLastRound

      public void showLastRound()
      Removes the end game token.

    • freezeGame

      public void freezeGame()
      Used to stop the game.

    • unfreezeGame

      public void unfreezeGame(Boolean currentTurn)
      Used to unfreeze the game.
      Parameters:
      currentTurn - true if it's the current turn of the player, false otherwise.

    • endAlone

      public void endAlone()
      Sends a message saying that nobody reconnected.
